name: Covenant: Project Zero
description:
Covenant: Project Zero is a sci-fi action adventure space opera set in a distant future ruled by massive interstellar corporations. You play as the fearless, crafty, and resourceful Captain John Covenant, leading your scrappy crew across the universe on an epic quest to unveil the past, survive the present and determine the future of humankind.

A New Adventure With a Retro Feel


Covenant: Project Zero blends stylized pixel art with immersive 3D environments for a truly retro 2.5D feel. Explore Covenant's universe using a mouse and keyboard or your favorite gamepad, taking advantage of a simple and intuitive control scheme.

Regardless of how you play, you'll be well-equipped to fight villains, solve puzzles, and interact with a cast of witty characters along the way.

Immersive Gameplay


Drawing inspiration from many old-school adventure favorites like Space Quest, the Monkey Island series, and similar cinematic hits, Covenant: Project Zero offers an immersive blend of action and adventure.

Epic Story, Living Universe


Although Covenant: Project Zero tells a linear story, there are many side-quests available to further experience the chaotic Covenant universe. Complete them to help others, obtain powerups, and hopefully - save the universe.

Your adventure is waiting, time to embark!
